name: TastyCurry
0:
”Alexa open tasty curry”
”Tell me something tasty”
”Tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tasty curry
des:
Tasty Curry suggests multiple types of curries for users to try! Never heard of Jalfrezi? Well if Tasty Curry suggests it, it might be the time to try it.

Tasty Curry draws inspiration from across the globe; from the streets of Thailand to the busy country of India.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
